page.title: 08Recreation in Irvine-Bowling
page.content: There has been a great increase in popularity for{bowling}recently. There are six bowling clubs in our town but each has a long waiting list of people wishing to become members. Mr Alex Herschell,treasurer of{Irvine Winton {Bowling Club,}which is over 120 years old,told us that he felt there was a need for a few extra clubs in the town.All of the clubs are private except Irvine Park which has a municipal club.{Membership}of clubs is for men and women although women are only{associate members}and do not have free use of the green unless special permission is given. Generally they can play on only two or three afternoons per week.{The fee}for{male members is about{Â£20}on average and about{Â£7}for{females.}Bowls cost between Â£70 and Â£100 and flat soled bowling shoes cost from Â£15 to Â£100.
